channel.title: Banned someone and cannot unban them [667] URGENT!
channel.description: I banned my friend as a joke and i already did it like 2 times but this time when i typed unban it said i unbanned him but when he logs in it says "your account has been disabled" How can i unban him?!? Please help!

item.title: Banned someone and cannot unban them [667] URGENT!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“adamgulka, post:3, topic:539958”][quote author=fpsnipmob link=topic=658810.msg4406338#msg4406338 date=1392087634]
Have you tried deleting the character file?
[/quote]

No, I dont want him to loose all of his stuff… he had mad bank[/quote]If his character file is not in binary, then you should be able to open it and edit it using notepad. If it is then modify the player loading to load his character in then unban him and save it.

Read full topic
